translations: v．隔离，使绝缘：使某物与外界隔离，以防止热量、电流、声音等的传递。
· The material insulates the building from the cold.
这种材料使建筑物与寒冷隔离。

sentences.sentence: Hair insulates animals against the sun by day as well as against the cold by night.
sentences.translation: 毛发使得动物可以在白天抵挡阳光，在夜晚抵挡严寒。

sentences.sentence: The approach insulates specialties, so that designers and programmers can use familiar tools and languages.
sentences.translation: 这种方法避免了特殊性，因此设计师和程序员就可以使用熟悉的工具和语言了。

sentences.sentence: This design insulates us from future changes in backends, at which point we only will have to rewrite our facade.
sentences.translation: 这种设计使我们不必考虑后端中以后可能出现的修改，如果后端改变了，那么只需重新编写外观。
